TITLE: Cramer's lighting round: I like J.M. Smucker over Church & Dwight
SUMMARY: "Mad Money" host Jim Cramer rings the lightning round bell, which means he's giving his answers to callers' stock questions at rapid speed.

TITLE: Charts suggest it’s time to buy the dips in oil, Jim Cramer says
SUMMARY: "The charts, as interpreted by Carley Garner, suggest that the oil speculators have been mostly wiped out, so it's time to buy the dips," he said.

TITLE: Jim Cramer says Constellation Energy and Sempra Energy are dependable utility stocks
SUMMARY: Jim Cramer advised investors to consider adding shares of “steady-eddy” utility companies to their portfolios for their dependability.

TITLE: Jim Cramer says crypto and high wages need to crash for the Fed to beat inflation
SUMMARY: Stocks ended the day up on Tuesday after the monthly consumer price index report showed that prices rose less than expected in November.
